articles.title: A solar storm on Thursday is expected to make the northern lights visible in 17 states - East Idaho News
articles.description: BOULDER, Colorado (KSL.com) — A solar storm forecast for Thursday is expected to give sky gazers in 17 American states a chance to glimpse the northern lights, the colorful sky show that happens when solar wind hits the atmosphere. Northern lights, also known…

articles.title: Why many Americans use unregulated health care sharing plans - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Many Americans have enrolled in an alternative to traditional health insurance called health care sharing plans. But unlike insurance, these plans are unregulated and don’t have to meet minimum health benefits mandated by the Affordable Care Act. Kate Harris …
